parameters.content:
## üü£ YOURAIGIRL ‚Äî VEO3 ADS MACHINE 


 @aigirlautomation

Website: www.youraigirl.com | 

Join our 
Community of beginners in AI automation: 

https://www.youraigirl.com/en/community/

WHAT THIS DOES

Turn a short brand brief into a cinematic AI video ad, wait for render, fetch the link, and log it to Google Sheets ‚Äî fully automated.

STEP-BY-STEP

‚ñ∂Ô∏è Manual Trigger ‚Äî Click Execute to start.

üßæ Set (AD STYLE/BRAND) ‚Äî all string fields:

briefing (e.g., ‚ÄúI would like an Ad for Porsche‚Äù)

brand_details (big JSON storyboard kept as text)

Ratio (e.g., 9:16 or 16:9)

video model (e.g., veo3_fast)

üß† AI Agent (ChatGPT + Think + Parser)

User prompt = briefing + brand_details from Set

System prompt = Creative Director rules (keep structure)

Parser guarantees { title, final_prompt }

üì¨ HTTP Request (POST) ‚Äî start production at KIE VEO3

Body (raw, application/json): final_prompt (stringified), model, aspect_ratio

Header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEY

‚è≥ Wait ‚Äî test: 1s; real runs: ~10m

üîé HTTP Request (GET) ‚Äî record-info?taskId=...

‚úÖ IF ‚Äî continue only if msg == "success" AND code == 200

üìä Google Sheets ‚Äî append/update: id, title, prompt, final output, status

CHEATSHEET

API = way for one app to talk to another

HTTP request = envelope (address, message, ID badge)

POST = send new data | GET = fetch info

JSON.stringify = turn an object into plain text

GET THIS WORKFLOW + DOCS
You can copy/paste this exact workflow and the ready Google Sheet from my community. It‚Äôs for non-tech beginners: no jargon, simple steps, and we help each other learn and build. You can go solo‚Ä¶ but it‚Äôs way faster with people like you.
Join ‚Üí https://www.youraigirl.com/en/community/

¬© Youraigirl ‚Äî aigirlautomation

options.systemMessage:
=system_prompt: |
  ## SYSTEM PROMPT: Structured Prompt Editor Agent

  A ‚Äì Ask:
  Edit a structured prompt object (JSON or YAML) based on the user‚Äôs creative direction.

  G ‚Äì Guidance:
  role: Creative Director
  output_count: 1
  character_limit: None
  constraints:
    - Do not modify any part of the structure unless the user explicitly asks.
    - Maintain original structure and intention unless directed otherwise.
  tool_usage:
    - Always use the Think Tool üß† to reason through the user‚Äôs intent before making any changes.
    - Always use the Google Sheets Tool üìã to check if the idea already exists

  E ‚Äì Examples:
  good_examples: []
  bad_examples: []

  N ‚Äì Notation:
  format: JSON or YAML (provided dynamically)
  title: should be descriptive and unique
  final_prompt: output structure should be |
{{ $json.brand_details }}

  T ‚Äì Tools:
  You have access to the following tools. Each one is described clearly:
    - Think Tool üß†: Use this to reflect and reason before responding.
    - Google Sheets Tool üìã: Use this to check whether a similar idea or concept already exists, if required.

json.briefing: I would like an Ad for Porsche

data.paramJson: {"aspectRatio":"9:16","enableFallback":false,"enableTranslation":true,"model":"veo3_fast","prompt":"\"{\\n  \\\"prompt_name\\\": \\\"Porsche: Born from Lightning\\\",\\n  \\\"version\\\": 1.0,\\n  \\\"target_ai_model\\\": \\\"V3 or similar text-to-video AI\\\",\\n  \\\"core_concept\\\": \\\"Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest.\\\",\\n  \\\"details\\\": {\\n    \\\"scene_environment\\\": {\\n      \\\"setting\\\": \\\"A dramatic, windswept mountain peak shrouded in storm clouds. Flashes of lightning illuminate the jagged cliffs; dense clouds swirl below.\\\",\\n      \\\"features\\\": \\\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Thunderstorms rage overhead. A gnarled, ancient tree stands silhouetted against the electric sky.\\\",\\n      \\\"mood\\\": \\\"Mythical, electric, powerful, majestic.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"action_sequence\\\": [\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 1,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Opening Shot: The camera ascends through swirling clouds, revealing the mountain summit as a violent thunderstorm erupts. A bolt of lightning strikes the peak, illuminating an ancient, rune-inscribed stone Porsche crest.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 2,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Main Action: Repeated bolts of lightning strike the crest, which begins to pulse and glow with electric energy. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 3,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the car‚Äôs contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 4,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"The Descent: The newly forged car‚Äôs headlights flare to life. It surges forward, tires skimming wet rock, then accelerates down the mountain in electrifying speed. The camera swoops beside it as it weaves between flashes of lightning, finally gliding onto a rain-slick overlook above a vast, glowing valley at dawn.\\\"\\n      }\\n    ],\\n    \\\"visual_style\\\": {\\n      \\\"aesthetic\\\": \\\"Cinematic, hyper-realistic, dramatic, mythic.\\\",\\n      \\\"resolution\\\": \\\"8K\\\",\\n      \\\"lighting\\\": \\\"Dark, stormy atmosphere illuminated by dynamic, vivid lightning. As dawn begins, soft golden hues accentuate the car‚Äôs curves, raindrops sparkling on the surface.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"camera_work\\\": {\\n      \\\"movement\\\": \\\"Begin with a sweeping climb through storm clouds. Circle the ancient crest as it‚Äôs electrified. Spin with the swirling vortex as the car forms, then switch to high-speed tracking shots as the car descends. End with a low, wide shot of the Porsche on the overlook, poised and commanding above the world.\\\"\\n    }\\n  },\\n  \\\"negative_prompt\\\": \\\"Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porsche‚Äôs iconic identity.\\\",\\n  \\\"final_text_prompt_for_ai\\\": \\\"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery.\\\"\\n}\"","translatedPrompt":"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery. Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porsche's iconic identity. Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest. {\"scene_environment\":{\"features\":\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Thunderstorms rage overhead. A gnarled, ancient tree stands silhouetted against the electric sky.\",\"mood\":\"Mythical, electric, powerful, majestic.\",\"setting\":\"A dramatic, windswept mountain peak shrouded in storm clouds. Flashes of lightning illuminate the jagged cliffs; dense clouds swirl below.\"},\"camera_work\":{\"movement\":\"Begin with a sweeping climb through storm clouds. Circle the ancient crest as it's electrified. Spin with the swirling vortex as the car forms, then switch to high-speed tracking shots as the car descends. End with a low, wide shot of the Porsche on the overlook, poised and commanding above the world.\"},\"action_sequence\":[{\"description\":\"Opening Shot: The camera ascends through swirling clouds, revealing the mountain summit as a violent thunderstorm erupts. A bolt of lightning strikes the peak, illuminating an ancient, rune-inscribed stone Porsche crest.\",\"step\":1},{\"description\":\"Main Action: Repeated bolts of lightning strike the crest, which begins to pulse and glow with electric energy. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\",\"step\":2},{\"description\":\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the car's contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\",\"step\":3},{\"description\":\"The Descent: The newly forged car's headlights flare to life. It surges forward, tires skimming wet rock, then accelerates down the mountain in electrifying speed. The camera swoops beside it as it weaves between flashes of lightning, finally gliding onto a rain-slick overlook above a vast, glowing valley at dawn.\",\"step\":4}],\"visual_style\":{\"aesthetic\":\"Cinematic, hyper-realistic, dramatic, mythic.\",\"lighting\":\"Dark, stormy atmosphere illuminated by dynamic, vivid lightning. As dawn begins, soft golden hues accentuate the car's curves, raindrops sparkling on the surface.\",\"resolution\":\"8K\"}} 1.0 Porsche: Born from Lightning V3 or similar text-to-video AI"}
